name: Virus.
description:
VIRUS.

Scientists and engineers created a pill shaped robot, capable of destroying new and unknown viruses. You (The Robot), must destroy every virus in a patient's infected body before it's too late.

This is a prototype, created by Unreal Engine 4. There will be no further development (unless there's a demand for it).

This project was made by team BuduSamurais:

Daniel Iman - Team Leader, Programmer (@danieliman02) Instagram.

Misha - Story Director (@_miishaa) Instagram.

Miasara Faiha - Sound Engineer (@mimimilomia) Instagram.

Raja Adam Ahmad  - Programmer, Mapper (@rajaadam20) Instagram.

Special thanks to:

Wan Azrina and Faisal for guiding us and providing internet connection for us (lol).

SMK Kubang Kerian Productions 2017.
